Name: Offering table
Description: Offering table, quadrangular in shape, with on one side a channel for liquids. The decoration consists of two libation vases and two round loaves of bread above each one of the vases, all of which is in low relief. On the four sides enclosing the interior basin are inscriptions in Meroitic, in double lines on the left half and in a single line on the rest of the piece.
